meta.name: Daily Business News Briefings with NewsAPI & GPT-4 Insights to Slack

parameters.content:
## üì∞ Summarize trending news into Slack with business insights

This workflow fetches the latest news based on your selected **country, category, and keyword query**, runs it through GPT for **summarization, prioritization, and sentiment analysis**, and posts the output to Slack.

- GPT **prioritizes the 10 most impactful articles**, ensuring you don't get random headlines.
- Each story is tagged: üü¢ Opportunity, üî¥ Risk, ‚ö™ Neutral.
- Ideal for teams who want market or trend updates directly in Slack.

### Who it's for
- Business leaders, marketers, investors, or analysts who want curated, actionable news summaries.
- Anyone needing a lightweight **market pulse** delivered via Slack.

### How to Set Up
1. **Set News Config node:** Define your country, category, and keyword query (e.g., `us`, `technology`, `OpenAI`).
2. Add your **NewsAPI** and **OpenAI GPT** credentials.
3. Configure your Slack webhook.
4. Activate the **Schedule Trigger** to auto-run daily.

### Requirements
- NewsAPI Key
- OpenAI API Key
- Slack Webhook URL

### How to Customize
- Adjust the **category, country, or query** in the Set News Config node.
- Remove the **Limit to Top 10 Trends node** to fetch all articles and let GPT filter.
- Customize the GPT prompt to control tone or depth of insights.

Need Help?

Join the [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/XPKeKXeB7d) or ask in the [Forum](https://community.n8n.io/).

## ‚öôÔ∏è Workflow Breakdown
1. **Schedule Trigger:** Set frequency (daily, weekly, etc.)
2. **Set News Config:** Configure country, category, and query.
3. **Fetch News Articles:** Pulls from NewsAPI.
4. **[Optional] Limit to Top 10 Trends:** Cap articles to 10, or remove to let GPT decide.
5. **Inject Config Data:** Makes config accessible to GPT.
6. **Merge:** Combines news + config.
7. **GPT Summary:** Summarizes, prioritizes top 10, tags sentiment, links back to query.
8. **Slack Post:** Auto-delivers insights to Slack.

## Inject Config Settings

Set your **country, category, and query** (keyword) here.

‚úÖ This controls the NewsAPI request and instructs GPT on which industry focus to prioritize in its analysis.

## Fetch Latest News Headlines
[Read more about HTTP Request node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.httprequest/)

This step pulls up to 100 top headlines from NewsAPI for your selected country, category, and keyword.

















**Important:
‚úÖ Add your NewsAPI Key in the Value field of the X-Api-Key header parameter inside this node.**

## Prepare Articles & Merge with Config

Formats the articles into plain text and merges them with your country, category, and query setting - providing GPT with clean data and context for accurate analysis.

## GPT Business Summary
[Read more about OpenAI Chat Model node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/sub-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.lmchatopenai/)

GPT analyzes the news, summarizes the 10 most relevant articles, and tags each as an üü¢ Opportunity, üî¥ Risk, or ‚ö™ Neutral. 

It also provides an overall trend summary.
You can customize the prompt to change the tone, number of articles, add recommendations, or focus on specific business areas.

## Post to Slack
[Read more about Slack node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.slack/)

Sends the GPT insights directly to your Slack channel.
You can customize the message format or destination channel.

Make sure your Slack credentials are connected in this node.

## Schedule Trigger

This controls how often the workflow runs ‚Äî set it to daily, weekly, or any custom interval you need.

Adjust the schedule settings to match how frequently you want news updates sent to Slack.
